presentation.name: Display Board Large
presentation.description: The large 14" x 20" display board is meant for cross-category product groupings. Display boards can be mounted onto a pin board or laid on a flat surface.

presentation.name: Rug Storage Bag
presentation.description: Bags are used for storing rug samples with loose fibers within the sample bag.

presentation.name: Gift Wrap Set
presentation.description: Maharam Gift Wrap is printed with a large-scale grid pattern. The irregularity of the pattern ensures that, when wrapped, no two gifts look the same. Each package contains 4 sheets of two-sided paper, with a total of four color options.
presentation.Note: Sample Order in Entry in DON

presentation.name: Sales Integration Announcement Card
presentation.description: Flat cards designed to be displayed as part of presentations and leave-behinds. The flat card should not be written on or altered in any way.

presentation.name: Sales Integration Tent Card
presentation.description: Tent cards designed to be displayed as part of presentations and leave behinds.

presentation.name: Wallcovering Brush
presentation.description: Wallcovering brushes are packed in a plastic bag and include cleaning instructions suitable for any type of High Performance Wallcovering. In certain cases, the brush is also suitable for cleaning upholstery.
presentation.Note: Sample Order in Entry in DON

presentation.name: Frame Bag Sales Edition
presentation.description: Ripstop nylon with webbing lattice. Durable vinyl base with mesh detail. Self-lined. One interior pocket.
presentation.Note:
This item requires manager approval.
